title: India: Gurugram Five-Star Refined Urban Retreat
description: Ideally situated on the outskirts of New Delhi, Crown Plaza Gurgaon is an urban retreat perfect for rest and revitalisation. Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or rejuvenate your mind and body at the Bodyzone fitness centre and spa. A diverse range of delectable dishes sure to satisfy your appetite await at Cafe G restaurant, as well as the option to indulge in a sophisticated spirit at the ConneXions lobby bar or a sweet treat at the Delicious pastry shop.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Gurgaon, an IHG Hotel

title: Indulgent Gurugram Stay within Ambience Mall just 30 Minutes from New Delhi
description: Discover true indulgence with a sophisticated stay at The Leela Ambience Gurugram Hotel and Residences, perfectly located in Gurugram just southwest of New Delhi, tucked away in the northern corner of India. During your stay, indulge in some retail therapy at the Ambience Mall right on your doorstep with rows of designer shops and even an ice-skating rink for you to enjoy. After a shopping spree, plunge into the onsite pool, make the most of a romantic evening with a treatment at the traditional Ayurvedic spa conveniently located onsite, or head to Diya to savour robust flavours, and visit Rubicon Bar and Cigar Lounge for an evening drink.
location_description: The Leela Ambience Gurugram Hotel and Residences
offer_address: National Highway 8, Ambience Island, DLF Phase 3, Sector 24, Gurugram, Haryana 122002

title: Northern India Retreat near New Delhi with Onsite Dining & Swimming Pool
description:
Located in the corporate hub of Udyog Vihar, this hotel offers comfort and convenience for business and leisure travellers alike. Unwind in stylish rooms, kick back at the coffee-to-cocktails bar, or squeeze in a workout at the 24/7 fitness centre. Just minutes from major business parks and a stone's throw from New Delhi Airport, this is your urban oasis in central Gurugram.

Indulge in global culinary delights at Gallery Cafe, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool, or host your next meeting in versatile event spaces. With the vibrant shopping districts of Ambience Mall and Cyber Hub nearby, everything is taken care of.
offer_address: 15, 1, Old Delhi Gurgaon Road, Electronic City, Gurugram, Haryana 122015, India

title: Five-Star Oberoi Elegance in the Heart of Gurugram with Two Onsite Restaurants & Lavish Spa
description: Discover the epitome of luxury living at this five-star urban oasis nestled in the heart of India's dynamic business capital, only moments from New Delhi. Immerse yourself in the glitz and glamour of The Oberoi, marvel at its architectural finesse, take a dip in the expansive outdoor pool, and rejuvenate with massage treatments at the world-class spa. For the gourmands, dine at the hotel's award-winning restaurant, threesixtyone° and sip on artisanal cocktails at The Piano Bar & Lounge. If you're ready for adventure and wish to explore, the city's historical gems and bustling shopping districts are a stone's throw away.
offer_address: 443, Shankar Chowk Rd, Phase V, Udyog Vihar, Sector 19, Gurugram, Haryana 122016, India

title: Modern Indian City Break with Easy Access to Bustling New Delhi Centre
description: Start your day at the Holiday Inn Express Gurugram Sector 50, an IHG Hotel, with a bite in The Express Café before venturing into Gurugram for incredible shopping or New Delhi for mind-boggling musueams, forts, tombs and gardens. When the sun sets, illuminating as far as the eye can see in a haze of golden light, return home to work up a sweat in the hotel’s fully equipped fitness centre.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Gurugram Sector 50, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Good Earth City Centre, Gurugram Haryana, 122018, India

title: Lavish Gurgaon City Indulgence near Delhi Airport with Spectacular Pool, Lush Spa & Three Onsite Restaurants
description: From sun-kissed courtyards, and lush landscaped gardens to reflection pools - prepare to be embraced by an aura of refined luxury at this five-star city oasis, cocooned in the bustling heart of Gurgaon. Sprawling across seven acres, the low-rise hotel's architectural opulence is complemented by warmly lit rooms, a dazzling turquoise pool, a tranquil spa offering Ayurvedic and Western-inspired therapies and three gourmet restaurants.
offer_address: 443 Udyog Vihar, Phase V, Gurgaon 122 016, India

title: Sophisticated Metropolitan India Stay with All Day Dining Venue, Pools & Fitness Centre
description: For a stylish and modern stay within a flourishing hub, Holiday Inn Gurugram Sector 90, an IHG Hotel is the ideal comfortable retreat after days spent exploring New Gurugram. Treat yourself to the variety of choices at Viva All Day Dining, serving up both buffet and à la carte Indian, Asian and Western cuisines, as well as delicious beverages and cocktails at the cosy Viva Bar. From the relaxing outdoor pool to the fitness centre, find a space to kick back and enjoy your time away.
location_description: Holiday Inn Gurugram Sector 90, an IHG Hotel
